sections.title: Community Support through Openspace Mailing List
sections.description: The Openspace mailing list is a list to discuss all aspects of methods and open source software tools to carry out spatial data analysis. A specific emphasis is on the GeoDa, GeoDaSpace, PySAL and CAST software programs.
sections.note: The list is not for the discussion of commercial spatial analysis software, but methodological debates are welcomed. It is for non-commercial use only.
listItems: Subscribe to the Openspace mailing list: openspace-list+subscribe@googlegroups.com
Post to the Openspace mailing list: openspace-list@googlegroups.com
